parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.02

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns control's text color in [[Color|Color (RGBA)]] format (see [[ctrlSetTextColor]]).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''ctrlTextColor''' control

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - text color
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[ctrlTextColor]] _control</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlSetTextColor]], [[ctrlText]]
</value></part></template>



<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
